amendment.description: To make available, from amounts for operation and maintenance for the Army, $10,000,000 for the Family Readiness Program of the National Guard, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3234 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3234 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To make available, from amounts for operation and maintenance for the Army, $10,000,000 for the Family Readiness Program of the National Guard, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3234 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3234 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL.
